heading: wedding marriage halls
description: if your dream wedding involves breathtaking scenery at a vibrant resort and all within a reasonable budget, our collection of affordable properties will bring your dreams to life. all the arrangements deliver incredible experiences at even more incredible prices. view details on locations for affordable destination celebrations on a budget below!

marriageHalls.heading: royal glass palace
marriageHalls.description: this exquisite palace combines elegant touches with contemporary design and a wide range of services to please your guests. a perfect setting for your dream wedding with first class hospitality from the experts.

specification.value: 3 rooms, closed spacious hall, buffet and à la carte
4/6, decker lane road, james sarani, kolkata - 700931

marriageHalls.heading: dancing daffodils
marriageHalls.description: this place is recently renovated and decorated with greenaries that perfectly creates the ambience for your magical experience. an exclusive musical and lighting shows will be arranged for customers on request.

specification.value: 2 rooms, open spacious lounge, buffet and à la carte
9/4, st. john's road, church street, bengaluru - 560276

marriageHalls.heading: palm villa resort
marriageHalls.description: this complex provides common areas surrounded by huge tropical gardens and designed to provide fun for children, teenagers and adults, offering a wide variety of activities throughout the day and artist performances with shows.

specification.value: 3 rooms, 1 kitchen, open spacious lounge, buffet and à la carte
42/1, bandra feast lane, brabourne road, mumbai - 400023

marriageHalls.heading: risa banquets
marriageHalls.description: risa banquets invites you to get lost in endless luxuries and offers an inspiring setting for staying relaxed or being as active as desired. whatever occasion it may be, we will make your stay unforgettable.

specification.value: 2 rooms, closed spacious hall, buffet and à la carte
